verses.verse: And thou, son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, take <WH3947> <WH8798> thee a sharp <WH2299> knife <WH2719>, take <WH3947> <WH8799> thee a barber's <WH1532> razor <WH8593>, and cause it to pass <WH5674> <WH8689> upon thine head <WH7218> and upon thy beard <WH2206>: then take <WH3947> <WH8804> thee balances <WH3976> to weigh <WH4948>, and divide <WH2505> <WH8765> the hair.

Thou shalt burn <WH1197> <WH8686> with fire <WH217> a third part <WH7992> in the midst <WH8432> of the city <WH5892>, when the days <WH3117> of the siege <WH4692> are fulfilled <WH4390> <WH8800>: and thou shalt take <WH3947> <WH8804> a third part <WH7992>, and smite <WH5221> <WH8686> about <WH5439> it with a knife <WH2719>: and a third part <WH7992> thou shalt scatter <WH2219> <WH8799> in the wind <WH7307>; and I will draw out <WH7324> <WH8686> a sword <WH2719> after <WH310> them.
Thou shalt also take <WH3947> <WH8804> thereof a few <WH4592> in number <WH4557>, and bind <WH6696> <WH8804> them in thy skirts <WH3671>.

Then take of them again <WH3947> <WH8799>, and cast <WH7993> <WH8689> them into the midst <WH8432> of the fire <WH784>, and burn <WH8313> <WH8804> them in the fire <WH784>; for thereof shall a fire <WH784> come forth <WH3318> <WH8799> into all the house <WH1004> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; This is Yerushalayim <WH3389>: I have set <WH7760> <WH8804> it in the midst <WH8432> of the nations <WH1471> and countries <WH776> that are round about <WH5439> her.

And she hath changed <WH4784> <WH8686> my judgments <WH4941> into wickedness <WH7564> more than the nations <WH1471>, and my statutes <WH2708> more than the countries <WH776> that are round about <WH5439> her: for they have refused <WH3988> <WH8804> my judgments <WH4941> and my statutes <WH2708>, they have not walked <WH1980> <WH8804> in them.

Therefore thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; Because ye multiplied <WH1995> <WH8800> more than the nations <WH1471> that are round about <WH5439> you, and have not walked <WH1980> <WH8804> in my statutes <WH2708>, neither have kept <WH6213> <WH8804> my judgments <WH4941>, neither have done <WH6213> <WH8804> according to the judgments <WH4941> of the nations <WH1471> that are round about <WH5439> you;

Therefore thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; Behold, I, even I, am against thee, and will execute <WH6213> <WH8804> judgments <WH4941> in the midst <WH8432> of thee in the sight <WH5869> of the nations <WH1471>.

And I will do <WH6213> <WH8804> in thee that which I have not done <WH6213> <WH8804>, and whereunto I will not do <WH6213> <WH8799> any more the like, because <WH3282> of all thine abominations <WH8441>.

Therefore the fathers <WH1> shall eat <WH398> <WH8799> the sons <WH1121> in the midst <WH8432> of thee, and the sons <WH1121> shall eat <WH398> <WH8799> their fathers <WH1>; and I will execute <WH6213> <WH8804> judgments <WH8201> in thee, and the whole remnant <WH7611> of thee will I scatter <WH2219> <WH8765> into all the winds <WH7307>.

Wherefore, as I live <WH2416>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; Surely, because thou hast defiled <WH2930> <WH8765> my sanctuary <WH4720> with all thy detestable things <WH8251>, and with all thine abominations <WH8441>, therefore will I also diminish <WH1639> <WH8799> thee; neither shall mine eye <WH5869> spare <WH2347> <WH8799>, neither will I have any pity <WH2550> <WH8799>.

A third part <WH7992> of thee shall die <WH4191> <WH8799> with the pestilence <WH1698>, and with famine <WH7458> shall they be consumed <WH3615> <WH8799> in the midst <WH8432> of thee: and a third part <WH7992> shall fall <WH5307> <WH8799> by the sword <WH2719> round about <WH5439> thee; and I will scatter <WH2219> <WH8762> a third part <WH7992> into all the winds <WH7307>, and I will draw out <WH7324> <WH8686> a sword <WH2719> after <WH310> them.

Thus shall mine anger <WH639> be accomplished <WH3615> <WH8804>, and I will cause my fury <WH2534> to rest <WH5117> <WH8689> upon them, and I will be comforted <WH5162> <WH8694>: and they shall know <WH3045> <WH8804> that I the YY <WH3068> have spoken <WH1696> <WH8765> it in my zeal <WH7068>, when I have accomplished <WH3615> <WH8763> my fury <WH2534> in them.

Moreover I will make <WH5414> <WH8799> thee waste <WH2723>, and a reproach <WH2781> among the nations <WH1471> that are round about <WH5439> thee, in the sight <WH5869> of all that pass by <WH5674> <WH8802>.

So it shall be a reproach <WH2781> and a taunt <WH1422>, an instruction <WH4148> and an astonishment <WH4923> unto the nations <WH1471> that are round about <WH5439> thee, when I shall execute <WH6213> <WH8800> judgments <WH8201> in thee in anger <WH639> and in fury <WH2534> and in furious <WH2534> rebukes <WH8433>. I the YY <WH3068> have spoken <WH1696> <WH8765> it.

When I shall send <WH7971> <WH8762> upon them the evil <WH7451> arrows <WH2671> of famine <WH7458>, which shall be for their destruction <WH4889>, and which I will send <WH7971> <WH8763> to destroy <WH7843> <WH8763> you: and I will increase <WH3254> <WH8686> the famine <WH7458> upon you, and will break <WH7665> <WH8804> your staff <WH4294> of bread <WH3899>:

So will I send <WH7971> <WH8765> upon you famine <WH7458> and evil <WH7451> beasts <WH2416>, and they shall bereave <WH7921> <WH8765> thee; and pestilence <WH1698> and blood <WH1818> shall pass through <WH5674> <WH8799> thee; and I will bring <WH935> <WH8686> the sword <WH2719> upon thee. I the YY <WH3068> have spoken <WH1696> <WH8765> it.
